SELECT A.INCDNT_ID , DATE_FORMAT(A.OPER_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') AS OPER_DT
, A.REP_ROUT_ID
, A.VHC_ID
, A.INCDNT_TYPE
, DATE_FORMAT(A.OCR_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS OCR_DTM
, A.ROUT_ID
, A.ALLOC_NO , A.INCDNT_DETAIL , A.OPER_SN , A.COR_ID , A.VHC_NO , A.DRV_ID , A.REP_ROUT_NM , A.ROUT_NM , A.LINK_ID , A.NODE_ID , A.GPS_X , A.GPS_Y , A.TM_X , A.TM_Y , A.REMARK , A.UPD_DTM , B.ROUT_NM , C.REP_ROUT_NM , D.COR_NM , E.DRV_NM , F.LINK_NM , G.NODE_NM
FROM BRT_INCDNT_INFO A LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST B ON A.ROUT_ID = B.ROUT_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_REP_ROUT_MST C ON A.REP_ROUT_ID = C.REP_ROUT_ID LEFT JOIN BRT_COR_MST D ON A.COR_ID = D.COR_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_DRV_MST E ON A.DRV_ID = E.DRV_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_LINK_MST F ON A.LINK_ID = F.LINK_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_NODE_MST G ON A.NODE_ID = G.NODE_ID
AND A.VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || A.REP_ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND A.VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND A.REP_ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY A.OPER_DT DESC

SELECT A.SCNRO_ID , A.SCNRO_NM , A.INCDNT_TYPE , A.INCDNT_RES_TYPE , A.RES_SCNRO , A.CLSFCTN_ID , A.REMARK , A.UPD_DTM , A.UPD_ID , B.CLSFCTN_NM , B.PHONE
FROM BRT_INCDNT_SCNRO_MST A LEFT JOIN BMS_EMER_CLSFCTN_MST B ON A.CLSFCTN_ID = B.CLSFCTN_ID
AND A.SCNRO_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || A.SCNRO_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND A.SCNRO_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND A.SCNRO_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
